meta.title: Plan ForPublic.id - Indonesian Planning Transparency
meta.description: Comprehensive platform for Indonesian development planning transparency, zoning maps, and public participation in spatial planning.
meta.keywords: indonesian planning, spatial planning, zoning maps, development planning, transparency, public participation, RTRW, RDTR

hero.title: Indonesian Planning Transparency
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive access to spatial plans, development master plans, and interactive zoning maps across Indonesia

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Centralized platform for transparent development planning and public participation

interactiveMaps.title: Interactive Planning Maps
interactiveMaps.description: Color-coded zoning maps with land use classification, master plan overlays with development phases, and 3D building height restrictions visualization

documentLibrary.title: Planning Document Library
documentLibrary.description: Searchable repository of planning documents, PDF viewer with zoom & annotation capabilities, and multi-language document support

planningSearch.title: Planning Information Search
planningSearch.description: Search by location, land use type, or keywords with advanced filtering and geographic search capabilities

developmentAnalytics.title: Development Analytics
developmentAnalytics.description: Land use distribution analysis, development density mapping, and environmental impact visualization

publicParticipation.title: Public Participation
publicParticipation.description: Online public consultation platform, comment & feedback submission, and public hearing schedules

developerTools.title: Developer Tools
developerTools.description: Planning data API access, embeddable map widgets, and GIS data export in multiple formats

maps.title: Interactive Planning Maps
maps.subtitle: Explore zoning maps and development master plans across Indonesia

documents.title: Planning Document Library
documents.subtitle: Access and search planning documents, regulations, and maps from across Indonesia

regions.title: Explore Regional Planning
regions.subtitle: Select a region to view spatial plans and regional development planning

projects.title: Development Projects
projects.subtitle: Track development projects and investments across Indonesia

participate.title: Public Participation
participate.subtitle: Participate in development planning processes and provide your input

glossary.title: Planning Glossary
glossary.subtitle: Definitions and explanations of spatial planning and development terms

footer.description: Indonesian development planning transparency platform to enhance public participation in spatial planning.
